2. The Notebook (2004) - A beautiful love story between two high school sweethearts who fall in love over 50 years later.

3. Enchanted (2007) - A heartwarming and magical love story that follows a princess who is cast away on the island of Neverland.

I hope these movie recommendations help you find something to watch that fits your desire for romance!
